title: aparaadhi naanalla
sahitya:
aparAdhi nAnalla aparAdhavenagilla kapaTa nATaka sUtradhAri
nInE 
(aparAdhi)

caraNam 1

nInE Adisadiralu jaDavunikeya bombe Enu mADalu balladu
tAnebEra
NIniTTa sUtradi calipavu kaikAlugaLu nInE mukkisalu mukkuvadE
had0avanu 
(aparAdhi)

caraNam 2

ondeNDu bAgila paTTaNakkedannadendu  ippattAru maneyALgaLa
tandu kAvala nilisi enna nI oLagiTTu munde bhavadali
phavaNibudanyAya 
(aparAdhi)

caraNam 3

yantra vAhaka nInE oLagiddu enna svatantranendenisi kolisuvare hELO
kantu pita lakSmIsha endAdaDandahudAnanda mUruti namma
purandaraviThala 
(aparAdhi)
